languages.text: {n}Молниеносные рефлексы не спасают завороженного вашими словами кабалита: вы с размаху впечатываете лоб в бледное лицо перед вами, хруст переломанных хрящей заглушается исступленным друкарским шипением. В ту же секунду вас поглощает нестерпимая боль, но сквозь ее марево вы все же различаете разъяренную физиономию Маражая с расползающимся под носом кровавым кружевом.{/n}

{n}Lightning reflexes fail to save the stunned Kabalite: you smash your forehead into the pale face in front of you, the crunch of broken cartilage drowned out by the frenzied hissing of the Drukhari. Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Молниеносные рефлексы не спасают завороженного вашими словами кабалита: вы с размаху впечатываете лоб в бледное лицо перед вами, хруст переломанных хрящей заглушается исступленным друкарским шипением. В ту же секунду вас поглощает нестерпимая боль, но сквозь ее марево вы все же различаете разъяренную физиономию Маражая с расползающимся под носом кровавым кружевом.{/n}

An unbearable pain washes over you, but even in its crimson haze you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and a patch of blood spreading under his nose.{/n}

Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ses réflexes éclair ne parviennent pas à sauver le Kabalite captivé. Vous écrasez votre front contre son visage pâle dans un bruit de cartilage broyé. Le Drukhari siffle frénétiquement. Une douleur atroce vous submerge, mais même au cœur de la brume cramoisie, vous pouvez distinguer le visage difforme de Marazhai et la tache de sang sous son nez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lightning reflexes fail to save the stunned Kabalite: you smash your forehead into the pale face in front of you, the crunch of broken cartilage drowned out by the frenzied hissing of the Drukhari. Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses réflexes éclair ne parviennent pas à sauver le Kabalite captivé. Vous écrasez votre front contre son visage pâle dans un bruit de cartilage broyé. Le Drukhari siffle frénétiquement. Une douleur atroce vous submerge, mais même au cœur de la brume cramoisie, vous pouvez distinguer le visage difforme de Marazhai et la tache de sang sous son nez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋对你过于专注，完全没能避开你的头槌。你猛地撞向面前苍白的脸，随后听到了软骨破碎的咯吱声，以及他疯狂的嘶吼声。随后，难以忍受的剧痛传遍了你的全身，但即便是在那深红色的阴霾中，你也依然看到了玛拉斋扭曲的脸，以及从他鼻子里流出的血。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lightning reflexes fail to save the stunned Kabalite: you smash your forehead into the pale face in front of you, the crunch of broken cartilage drowned out by the frenzied hissing of the Drukhari. Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋对你过于专注，完全没能避开你的头槌。你猛地撞向面前苍白的脸，随后听到了软骨破碎的咯吱声，以及他疯狂的嘶吼声。随后，难以忍受的剧痛传遍了你的全身，但即便是在那深红色的阴霾中，你也依然看到了玛拉斋扭曲的脸，以及从他鼻子里流出的血。{/n}

languages.text: {n}稲妻のような反射神経も、唖然とするカバライトの前では無力だった。目の前の青白い顔にあなたの額がぶつかる。軟骨の砕ける音はデュカーリの出す狂ったような呼吸音にかき消された。耐え難い痛みがあなたを襲ったが、その深紅のもやの中でも、あなたはマラズハイの歪んだ顔と、彼の鼻の下から広がる血の斑点を確認することができた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lightning reflexes fail to save the stunned Kabalite: you smash your forehead into the pale face in front of you, the crunch of broken cartilage drowned out by the frenzied hissing of the Drukhari. Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}稲妻のような反射神経も、唖然とするカバライトの前では無力だった。目の前の青白い顔にあなたの額がぶつかる。軟骨の砕ける音はデュカーリの出す狂ったような呼吸音にかき消された。耐え難い痛みがあなたを襲ったが、その深紅のもやの中でも、あなたはマラズハイの歪んだ顔と、彼の鼻の下から広がる血の斑点を確認することができた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Kabale-Mitglied schafft es nicht, sich mit blitzschnellen Reflexen zu retten. Du rammst deine Stirn in sein blasses Gesicht. Das Knirschen zerbrechender Knorpel wird nur vom Fauchen des Drukhari übertönt. Du erlebst unerträglichen Schmerz, aber trotz seines dunkelroten Dunsts erkennst du noch Marazhais verzerrtes Gesicht und das viele Blut, das sich unter seiner Nase ansammelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lightning reflexes fail to save the stunned Kabalite: you smash your forehead into the pale face in front of you, the crunch of broken cartilage drowned out by the frenzied hissing of the Drukhari. Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Kabale-Mitglied schafft es nicht, sich mit blitzschnellen Reflexen zu retten. Du rammst deine Stirn in sein blasses Gesicht, das Knirschen zerbrechender Knorpel wird dabei nur vom Fauchen des Drukhari übertönt. Du erlebst unerträglichen Schmerz, aber trotz seines dunkelroten Dunsts erkennst du noch Marazhais verzerrtes Gesicht und das viele Blut, was sich unter seiner Nase ansammelt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los fulgurantes reflejos del Kabalista aturdido no bastan para salvarle: estampas tu frente en el rostro lívido que tienes delante, y el crujido del cartílago al partirse queda ahogado por los frenéticos bufidos del Drukhari. Un dolor insoportable se apodera de ti, pero incluso a través del velo carmesí eres capaz de distinguir el rostro contraído de Marazhai y el hilillo de sangre que le mana de la nariz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lightning reflexes fail to save the stunned Kabalite: you smash your forehead into the pale face in front of you, the crunch of broken cartilage drowned out by the frenzied hissing of the Drukhari. Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los fulgurantes reflejos del kabalista no bastan para salvarle: estampas tu frente en el rostro lívido que tienes delante, y el crujido del cartílago al partirse queda ahogado por los frenéticos bufidos del Drukhari. Un dolor insoportable se apodera de ti, pero incluso a través del velo carmesí eres capaz de distinguir el rostro contraído de Marazhai y el hilillo de sangre que le mana de la nariz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yıldırım gibi refleksleri, afallamış Kabalist'i kurtarmaya yetmiyor: Alnını, önünde duran solgun yüze çarpıyorsun. Kırılan kıkırdaklardan gelen çatırtı, Drukhari'nin öfkeli tıslamaları tarafından yutuluyor. Dayanılamaz bir acı duymana rağmen bu kızıl pus içinde dâhi Marazhai'ın çarpık yüzünü ve burnunun altından akan kanı seçebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lightning reflexes fail to save the stunned Kabalite: you smash your forehead into the pale face in front of you, the crunch of broken cartilage drowned out by the frenzied hissing of the Drukhari. Unbearable pain washes over you but, even in its crimson haze, you can still make out Marazhai's twisted face and the patch of blood spreading beneath his nose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yıldırım gibi refleksleri, afallamış Kabalist'i kurtarmaya yetmiyor: Alnını, önünde duran solgun yüze çarpıyorsun, kırılan kıkırdaklardan gelen çatırtı, Drukhari'nin öfkeli tıslamaları içinde boğuluyor. Dayanılamaz bir acı duyuyorsun ancak bu kızıl pus içinde dâhi Marazhai'ın çarpık yüzünü ve burnunun altından akan kanı seçebiliyorsun.{/n}
